code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useContextAuth}from'../../contexts/AuthContext';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'../../styles/pages/LoginPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const{login}=useContextAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await login(email,password);navigate('/profile');}catch(error){console.log(error.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Log In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Log In"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/forgot-password",children:"Forgot User/Password?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",children:"Sign Up"})]})]});};export default LoginPage;
